bibl.title: To the Origins of Greek Stenography (P. Monts. Roca I). (Orientalia Montserratensia. 1.)

publisher.orgName: Publicacions de l'Abadia de Montserrat. Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas

bibl.biblScope: et 29 pll. coul. + 1 p. d'Addenda & Corrigenda. h.t.
bibl.note: P. Monts. Roca I . - Pp. 7-9: Pius-Ramon TRAGAN, Prefaci [en catalan]. - Introduction. - I. The Montserrat Codex Miscellaneus (P. Barc. Inv. 126-178, 292, 338). - II. General Remarks on the Montserrat Word List. - III. The Text of the Montserrat Word List [P. Barc. Inv. 166-178; provenance unknown, IVth century]. - IV. Concordance of the Commentary Papyri. - V. Greek Shorthand Manual Reconstruction [partial re-edition of Shorth. Man. (= Pack2 2753-2764). - VI. Annotations to the Montserrat Word List. - VII. Index to the Montserrat Word List. - Bibliography.
